meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bitty.
meanings.sent1: The bittinesses of the sand made it rough to walk on.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the bittinesses of the sugar in my mouth.
meanings.sent3: The bittinesses of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to put together.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a bittinesses that grated on my ears.
meanings.sent5: The bittinesses of the gravel made it painful to kneel on.

meanings.definition: The presence of small, hard particles in a substance.
meanings.sent1: The bittinesses in the flour were noticeable when baking.
meanings.sent2: I could taste the bittinesses of the salt in the soup.
meanings.sent3: The bittinesses in the paint caused a rough texture on the wall.
meanings.sent4: The bittinesses in the soil made it difficult to plant seeds.
meanings.sent5: The bittinesses in the lotion felt like sand on my skin.
